name: Salon: DAOs & Incentives for AI Alignment
description:
8:30-9:30pm at the Ship

In this session we'll explore how can crypto help AI Alignment efforts:


What tools can we build to help with transparency, collaboration, funding and security? 


What kinds of constitutions or even DAOs could be created to coordinate efforts?


What are the risks and benefits of the options involved (e.g. quadratic funding, hypercerts, existing models like Gitcoin & VitaDAO) and how can there be decentralized governance without risks?
